main event: Four boy scouts observed two oblong, sharply defined objects resembling passenger planes over San Angelo, Texas.
interesting points: The first object moved swiftly in a southwest direction before descending rapidly behind the horizon., A second identical object appeared shortly after the first one disappeared., One of the objects returned two minutes later and hovered before moving west and out of sight., The sighting lasted approximately 10 minutes., Following the event, other individuals claimed they saw three UFOs the same night, corroborating the scouts' observation.
